items.title: This week high-tech pioneer Nicholas Grimshaw died
items.excerpt: This week on Dezeen , Grimshaw founder Nicholas Grimshaw passed away at the age of 85 and we reported from events in Copenhagen, Singapore, Helsinki, Oslo, London and Lake Como.

items.title: Jos Tan "celebrates city living" with compact Melbourne home
items.excerpt: Australian architect Jos Tan has completed Melville, a compact home in Melbourne with a simple, pale brick form that mimics the appearance of the neighbouring buildings.
